solution_line_template: The total cost of the iPhone will cost Carrie ${iphone_cost} - ${trade_in_value} = $<<{iphone_cost}-{trade_in_value}={remaining_cost}>>{remaining_cost}.
It will take her ${remaining_cost} / ${earnings_per_week} = <<{remaining_cost}/{earnings_per_week}={weeks_to_work}>>{weeks_to_work} weeks to earn enough money.
